mapper.select: select p.id, p.project_name projectName, d1.dict_code dictCode from sop_project p left join dict d1 on p.project_status=d1.dict_code where p.id=#{projectId};
mapper.insert:
insert into sop_task ( id, project_id, task_name, task_type, task_flag, task_order, task_deadline, department_id, assign_uid, task_status, remark, created_time, updated_time ) values ( #{id}, #{projectId}, #{taskName}, #{taskType}, #{taskFlag}, #{taskOrder}, #{taskDeadline}, #{departmentId}, #{assignUid}, #{taskStatus}, #{remark}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime} );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, date_format(r.meeting_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') meetingDate, d1.name meetingResult FROM sop_meeting_record r left join dict d1 on r.meeting_result=d1.dict_code WHERE r.project_id=#{projectId} and r.meeting_type=#{meetingType} ORDER BY r.created_time desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT id, concat(file_name,'.',file_suffix) as fileName, file_suffix fileSuffix, file_key fileKey, created_time fileTime FROM sop_file WHERE project_id=#{projectId} and file_worktype=#{fileWorkType} ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT 1;
